mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.file_name fileName, a.model_id modelId, b.user_name createName, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime, c.user_name lastUpdateName, CONVERT(a.last_update_time, char) lastUpdateTime FROM report_import_model a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON a.create_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff c ON a.last_update_id = c.user_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.file_name LIKE '%${fileName}%'
AND a.model_id LIKE '%${modelId}%'
